channel.title: Blog on Stephen Mwangi
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on Stephen Mwangi

item.title: Fighting AI Sycophancy
item.description: LLMs are trained to be agreeable, turning every conversation into an echo chamber. Here’s how to get them to actually challenge your thinking instead of just flattering you

item.title: In Memory Key-Value Store
item.description: In this post, we’ll build an in-memory key-value store in Go as part of the Build Your Own Distributed Key-Value Store series

item.title: Vemödalen
item.description: Vemödalen is the fear that originality is no longer possible
